```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r load data}
can_reg = read.csv("Cancer_Registry.csv")

#first-round filter of redundant variables
can_reg = 
  can_reg %>% 
  select(Geography, TARGET_deathRate, incidenceRate, povertyPercent,studyPerCap, MedianAge, PctMarriedHouseholds, PctHS25_Over, PctBachDeg25_Over, PctPublicCoverageAlone, PctWhite ) %>%
  filter(MedianAge < 100) 
```
